src:
Begini Reaksi Andrew Robertson dan Sadio Mane Usai Bantu Liverpool Menang Dramatis
03 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Andrew Robertson dan Sadio Mane mejadi pahlawan kemenangan dramatis Liverpool atas Aston Villa di Premier League, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB. Dua gol mereka membantu Liverpool menang di pengujung laga.
Kemenangan ini memang layak dianggap sebagai comeback dramatis The Reds. Betapa tidak, tim asuhan Jurgen Klopp ini tertinggal terlebih dahulu ketika Mahmoud Hassan menjebol gawang Alisson Becker di menit ke-21. Setelahnya, pertandingan jadi lebih sulit untuk Liverpool.
Penyerang-penyerang Liverpool mencoba segala cara untuk menjebol gawang Tom Heaton, tapi gol yang ditunggu-tunggu tidak kunjung tiba. Tepat ketika keputusasaan mulai merayap, pertandingan lantas berbalik menguntungkan Liverpool.
Adalah Robertson dan Mane yang jadi penentu. Baca komentar selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Here's Reaction Andrew Robertson and Sadio Mane After Help Liverpool Win Dramatically
Nov 3 2019, 2:00 PM by Bola.net
Bola.net - Andrew Robertson and Sadio Mane were the heroes of Liverpool's dramatic victory over Aston Villa in the Premier League on Saturday (11/02/2019) evening hrs. Their two goals helped Liverpool win at the end of the match.
This victory deserves to be considered a dramatic comeback of the Reds. Imagine, Jurgen Klopp's team was left behind first when Mahmoud Hassan broke down Alisson Becker's goal in the 21st minute. After that, the match became more difficult for Liverpool.
Liverpool attackers tried everything they could to break Tom Heaton's goal, but the long-awaited goal never arrived. Just as despair began to creep, the match then turned in favor of Liverpool.
It was Robertson and Mane who were deciding. Read the full comment below, Bolaneters!
